heading: palm exec among dead
subheading: kurt schwenk, director of business development for palm computing, maker of the palmpilot, was among those killed early sunday when egyptair flight 990 crashed into the atlantic ocean. schwenk, 39, was traveling to egypt with several family members and his girlfriend. they were among the 129 americans reported aboard the airliner, which went into a steep dive, apparently broke apart, and fell into the ocean shortly after leaving jfk international. all 217 people on board were killed.
author: wired staff
text: kurt schwenk, director of business development for palm computing, maker of the palmpilot, was among those killed early sunday when egyptair flight 990 crashed into the atlantic ocean. schwenk, 39, was traveling to egypt with several family members and his girlfriend. they were among the 129 americans reported aboard the airliner, which went into a steep dive, apparently broke apart, and fell into the ocean shortly after leaving jfk international. all 217 people on board were killed.
